attachfiles-no-upload-permissions: To manage attached files, you should [[Special:UserLogin|log in]] using an account with sufficient permissions.
attachfiles-delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete ${name}?
attachfiles-delete-permission-error: You don't have permission to delete ${name}.
attachfiles-upload-file-size-error: This file is bigger than the allowed upload size (${maxUploadSize}).
attachfiles-upload-invalid-name-error: This file name is not valid. Please choose a different name.
attachfiles-upload-exists-error: A file with this name already exists. Please choose a different name.
attachfiles-upload-permission-error: You don't have permission to upload files.
